content:
I think there might be some confusion! You mentioned you just finished the first 4 episodes of "Game of Thrones", but you also said you're planning to start it soon. Did you mean to say you're planning to continue watching it soon?

Either way, "Game of Thrones" is an amazing series, and I'm sure you'll enjoy the rest of it! If you have any questions or need any recommendations for other shows, feel free to ask.

Now, back to your Netflix issue: please go ahead and try the troubleshooting steps I provided earlier. If you're still experiencing problems, we can explore further solutions or consider reaching out to Netflix support.

Remember to take your time, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any assistance or have any questions. Good luck, and I hope you get back to enjoying your favorite shows soon!
